description.@en: A strange illusion falls the moon; a twisted, stitched-together grin, and a hollow frown. Its eyes watch balefully over the battlefield, as the blessing of the Slavering Maw is felt by all.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, those who are not occultists of the Slavering Maw must succeed at a Resolve Test or else they suffer from Terror. In addition, occultists of the Slavering Maw may flip the results to succeed all Combat-based Skill Tests for the Duration of the spell.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but foes automatically suffer from Terror.

criticalFailure.@en: The illusion is seen only by occultists of the Slavering Maw. All those who behold its countenance automatically suffer from Terror.

reagents.@en: The moon, providing it can be seen
